message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on this incredible item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,800. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you're willing to negotiate. However, $9,800 is still a bit steep for me. How about we meet in the middle at $9,500?  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm still willing to make a deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counteroffer at $9,600. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's a fair price for this amazing product.
